attributes.action: Stop mass production of hybrid cars buses etc until they are more sustainable then the cars buses etc we have now
attributes.additional_details:
Making these hybrid transports systems is a good idea as to create a more sustainable planet we need to develop these kinds of technology's and In order to do this hybrids must be made and constantly improved

However putting these vehicles in mass production at this moment in time is outrageous as they are more harmful to the environment then the existing petrol cars for example these car use both petrol and electricity and seen as petrol is a scarce resource and leads to global warming it is bad also electricity these days mainly comes from the burning of fossil fuels which most people don't think about also leading to global warming secretly polluting our atmosphere and to think these vehicles are also more expensive is again frustrating as I'm paying to kill my planted as it seems
